metadata.title: CVE-2024-42320 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/dasd: fix error checks in dasd_copy_pair_store()dasd_add_busid() can return an error via ERR_PTR() if an allocationfails. However, two callsites in dasd_copy_pair_store() do not checkthe result, potentially resulting in a NULL pointer dereference. Fixthis by checking the result with IS_ERR() and returning the error upthe stack.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
